en.lang_this_page_describes_a_doctor's_spec: This page describes a doctor's specialty. You can add or edit or delete doctors specialty from here.
en.lang_for_adding_a_new_specialty,_you_sho: For adding a new specialty, you should click the top right corner add button.
en.lang_2._parent_specialty_means_that_you_: 2. parent specialty means that you should select this Specialty's type if it exists.
en.lang_you_are_going_to_delete_this_record: You are going to delete this record. Are you sure to proceed?
